docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled Tuesday that Utah can cut off federal funds to the state's Planned Parenthood organization, a move the Republican governor ordered after the release of secretly recorded videos by an anti-abortion group.

headline.main: Utah Can Block Planned Parenthood Funds While Suit Proceeds
headline.print_headline: Utah Can Block Planned Parenthood Funds While Suit Proceeds

docs.snippet: A federal judge ruled Tuesday that Utah can cut off federal funds to the state's Planned Parenthood organization, a move the Republican governor ordered after the release of secretly recorded videos by an anti-abortion group.

headline.main: Student Winners From Our 2015 Review Contest

docs.abstract: Our judges chose nine winners, nine runners-up and 22 honorable mentions from writing on everything from “South Park” to Mozart. Congratulations!
docs.snippet: Our judges chose nine winners, nine runners-up and 22 honorable mentions from writing on everything from “South Park” to Mozart. Congratulations!

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton on Tuesday announced a slate of proposals to battle Alzheimer's disease and seek a cure by 2025, including an increase in funding for research on the disease and related disorders.

headline.main: Democrat Clinton Announces Plan to Battle Alzheimer's
headline.print_headline: Democrat Clinton Announces Plan to Battle Alzheimer's

docs.snippet: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton on Tuesday announced a slate of proposals to battle Alzheimer's disease and seek a cure by 2025, including an increase in funding for research on the disease and related disorders.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama will make an appearance in Jerry Seinfeld's "Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee" on Dec. 30.

headline.main: Obama Rides With Seinfeld on 'Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee'
headline.print_headline: Obama Rides With Seinfeld on 'Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee'

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama will make an appearance in Jerry Seinfeld's "Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee" on Dec. 30.

docs.lead_paragraph: The president of the Mayo Clinic writes that commercial insurance should be included in reimbursement analysis.
docs.snippet: The president of the Mayo Clinic writes that commercial insurance should be included in reimbursement analysis.

docs.lead_paragraph: Enrique Marquez, accused of abetting the couple who killed 14 people this month, said he had no questions about his case in a brief court appearance.

headline.main: Neighbor of San Bernardino Attackers Is Ordered Held Without Bail
headline.print_headline: Friend Who Bought Guns in San Bernardino Attack Is Deemed a Threat and Denied Bail

docs.abstract: Judge David T Bristow orders Enrique Marquez, who bought weapons that couple used in San Bernardino, Calif, massacre, be held without bail, saying he is threat to public; Marquez is charged with conspiring to support terrorists, stemming from 2011-2012 plots that he and Syed Rizwan Farook, who died in shootout with police during San Bernardino attack, planned.
docs.snippet: Enrique Marquez, accused of abetting the couple who killed 14 people this month, said he had no questions about his case in a brief court appearance.
